content.rendered:
Lordz.io is free to play!

You can play it on your web browser or download the mobile app for Android or iOS.

Lordz.io is a multiplayer strategy game with a medieval theme!

Here’s the rundown:

  • You play as a lord in a medieval world, tasked with building a small empire.
  • You’ll collect gold, build structures, and create an army to defend your land and potentially conquer others.

Gameplay:

  • Build your base: Construct houses to house your growing army, gold mines to fuel your economy, and mage towers for magical support.
  • Manage resources: Collect gold by hand or build mines to automate the process.
  • Military might: Train different types of units like soldiers, archers, and knights to form a formidable army.
  • Combat: Defend against attacks from other players or go on the offensive and raid their bases.
